name: Tiny Knights
description:
Let the Medieval Battle Commence!...



Welcome to Tiny Knights
Set in the Tiny Universe, my very own design!

Tiny Knights throws you in to a Medieval Battle Arena, it's a fight to the Ragdoll...

(The King of the Tinys would usually be watching the battle, but he's absent in this version.



This game is still in it's very early stages and will eventually have many more features!

Update 0.1! - First Version:

  • Accurately tracked attacks so damage is taken depending on the actual swing
  • Feel the impact as the Tinys get pushed about by attacks
  • Randomly chosen enemies with randomly chosen Weapon Materials and Shields
  • There's a crowd... Not really interactive yet, but they cheer at least!
  • First Person Mode (Press V by Default)



Future features in the pipeline:
  • An Interactive Crowd System
  • The King will be watching, and will also interact based on the fight
  • Picking up Weapons and Helmets
  • More Game Modes
  • More Weapons and Helmets!
  • More Weapon types including Bow and Arrow, Crossbows, Spears, Warhammers...
  • More Arenas
  • Multiplayer!


The game is free for now as it is in really early alpha stages,

Try it and see what you think!



Be sure to check out my stuff on YouTube!
